doctors.title: Our Expert Doctors
doctors.login_required: Please log in first to book an appointment.
doctors.select_doctor_subtitle: Please click on the doctor you want to proceed with.
doctors.no_bio_info: No information available yet for this doctor.

acil.title: Emergency 7/24
acil.p1: We are aware that immediate intervention is vital in all health problems that develop suddenly and threaten life integrity. Our Emergency Service Unit provides 24/7 uninterrupted service with our expert physicians and experienced medical personnel.
acil.p2: Our emergency service is not just an entry point for our hospital; it is a full-fledged life support center for our patients in life-threatening conditions. We have the advanced technological infrastructure and expert staff to respond as quickly as possible to all kinds of emergencies, from heart attacks to trauma, high fever to suddenly developing pains. Every patient applying to our hospital undergoes a comprehensive initial examination by our expert physicians, and their health status is meticulously analyzed. Required blood tests and radiological examinations are rapidly concluded in our laboratory and imaging units with emergency service priority. Our patients requiring short-term treatment or clinical observation are followed under expert supervision in our comfortable observation rooms equipped with all kinds of medical support and monitoring. Our emergency service works in 24-hour uninterrupted communication and coordination with all specialty branches of our hospital such as Cardiology, Neurology, and General Surgery. When needed, relevant branch physicians are rapidly called for consultation, and the most accurate holistic treatment process for our patient is started without delay. Our patients whose intervention is completed are discharged, admitted to our relevant services, or organized in a fully equipped manner for advanced examination processes according to their health status requirements.

dis.title: Oral and Dental
dis.p1: Our hospital's Oral and Dental Health unit utilizes all the possibilities of modern medicine to provide you with the most ideal smile as well as protecting your dental and gum health. In our clinical environment equipped with an expert physician staff and advanced technological equipment, we carry out personalized treatment planning for our patients of all ages. While we ensure our little guests overcome their fears with our sensitive approach in the field of pediatric dentistry (pedodontics), we bring functionality together with aesthetics through aesthetic dentistry, smile design, whitening, and laminate applications in adults. With our experienced team, we provide services in a wide range from modern implant surgery that permanently resolves tooth loss to sensitive root canal treatment and filling procedures aimed at tooth preservation. Without compromising on sterilization and disinfection standards in our treatment processes, we aim to make the most accurate diagnosis with the help of intraoral scanners and digital imaging systems. We provide a reliable, comfortable, and result-oriented health service in preventive dentistry and surgical operations to both improve our patients' oral health and increase their quality of life.

diyet.title: Nutrition and Diet
diyet.p1: In our Nutrition and Diet Polyclinic, we offer professional diet and nutrition counseling to support healthy living, provide weight management, and support the prevention and treatment processes of diseases. We help you gain a sustainable healthy life habit by creating personalized nutrition plans suitable for each individual's health and lifestyle.
diyet.p2: Following comprehensive evaluations performed by our expert dietitians in our polyclinic, body analysis, metabolic rate, and needs analyses are conducted, and support is provided in many areas from weight management to nutrition plans specific to diseases. While taking a step towards a healthy future, we are by your side with our diet and nutrition recommendations that will increase your quality of life.

details.title: Personalized Nutrition Program
details.text: Personalized nutrition programs are diet programs prepared entirely according to the individual's lifestyle and values.

details.title: Life Coaching
details.text: A life coach is an expert in the field who has completed the necessary training. Helps the person discover and develop their own potential.

details.title: Healthy Nutrition and Weight Gain
details.text: Diet or Dietetics service should not be perceived only as losing weight. Healthy weight gain is also among the services.

details.title: Healthy Nutrition and Weight Loss
details.text: The most common action when it comes to dietetics service is 'Losing weight'.

details.title: Appetite Management and Weight Control
details.text: The most important factor in weight loss is appetite control.

details.title: Child Nutrition
details.text: A special diet system that includes all the foods that the young individual should consume for complete development.

details.title: Nutrition in Diabetes
details.text: Healthy carbohydrates should be preferred instead of white bread and sugary foods.

details.title: Corporate Nutrition Consultancy
details.text: Service taken to increase the performance and life quality of employees and managers.

details.title: Sports Nutrition
details.text: Special dietetics service organized by considering the physical activity intensity of the athlete.

details.title: Nutrition in Pregnancy
details.text: Special dietetics service where all the nutrients needed by both the mother and the baby are specially calculated.

details.title: Nutrition in Breastfeeding
details.text: It is very important for the baby's brain development and physical health that breast milk is in its most efficient form.

details.title: Nutrition in Hypertension
details.text: It is recommended for individuals with hypertension to consume a healthy and balanced diet rich in fresh vegetables and fruits.

details.title: Detailed Body Analysis
details.text: The measurement that determines the muscle, fat and water ratio of the body.

derma.title: Dermatology
derma.p1: The Dermatology unit is a basic medical branch focusing on the health of the skin, which is our body's largest and most important defense shield against the outside world, as well as its appendages such as hair and nails. In our department, not only the diagnosis and treatment of skin diseases but also oral and nasal mucosa problems and the detection and follow-up of sexually transmitted diseases are meticulously carried out by our expert physicians. Since skin health is a reflection of general body integrity, the symptoms that appear can sometimes create only an aesthetic concern, while at other times they can be heralds of more serious underlying health problems.
derma.p2: Since dermatological disorders that directly affect external appearance also closely concern individuals' social lives and psychological well-being, both medical and aesthetic solutions are offered together in our modern clinical environment. Diagnostic processes are carried out with advanced technological devices in a wide range from chronic conditions such as acne, eczema, and psoriasis to skin tumors and allergic reactions. With the awareness that early diagnosis and rapid treatment planning are of vital importance to stop the progression of the disease and prevent permanent damage, a modern and reliable treatment protocol specific to each patient is applied.

cerrahi.title: General Surgery
cerrahi.p1: General Surgery is one of the widest and most basic disciplines of medicine, providing surgical treatment for many systemic and local diseases in the body. Our department works in full integration and cooperation with all other medical branches to provide the most accurate treatment protocol for our patients. In addition to traditional open surgery methods, advanced endoscopic and laparoscopic (closed) surgical interventions that shorten our patients' recovery times and increase their comfort are applied by our expert surgeons with high success rates.
cerrahi.p2: In our unit; thyroid gland (goiter) diseases, breast health and surgery, esophagus, stomach, small and large intestine disorders, and all surgical processes covering the rectum and anus region are meticulously managed. In addition, liver, gallbladder, bile duct diseases, and all kinds of hernia operations are performed with modern medical technologies. Our general surgery team, which focuses on patient safety at every step from the diagnosis phase to the rehabilitation process, aims to produce permanent and effective solutions for your health problems by using the most up-to-date techniques offered by modern medicine even in complex surgical cases.

goz.title: Ophthalmology
goz.p1: Ophthalmology is a vital element that directly affects how individuals perceive the world and their general quality of life, and should be emphasized with sensitivity. Even the slightest loss in vision can limit daily activities and negatively affect a person's independence. Although some eye diseases do not show significant symptoms in the initial stage, if they are not diagnosed and treated in the early period, they can progress rapidly and lead to permanent and irreversible damage, even vision loss.
goz.p2: In order to prevent these risks, regular eye examinations performed with advanced technological devices play a critical role in detecting possible diseases at their very initial stage. At our hospital, comprehensive screening and treatment services are offered to protect the eye health of individuals of all ages. To ensure early detection of serious health problems such as cataract, glaucoma (eye pressure), and retina diseases as well as vision defects, we strongly recommend that even healthy individuals with no complaints undergo a detailed eye screening at least once a year.

dahiliye.title: Internal Medicine
dahiliye.p1: Our hospital's Internal Medicine polyclinic serves as the first point of contact and solution center for the health problems of adult patients. Our expert physician staff meticulously carries out the diagnosis, treatment, and follow-up processes of a wide range of diseases, considering the complex relationship of body systems with each other. In our unit, all processes from common infectious diseases such as bronchitis, cold, and cystitis to metabolic disorders such as diabetes (sugar disease), hypertension, and goiter, which are among the most important health problems of the modern age, are managed with current medical protocols.
dahiliye.p2: Our Internal Medicine unit not only treats individual diseases but also plays a critical role in the early diagnosis of complaints related to the cardiovascular system such as heart failure and palpitations. In order to prevent diseases and keep chronic conditions under control, personalized treatment plans are created by considering our patients' life styles and genetic backgrounds. Thanks to our multifaceted perspective, we aim to make the most accurate diagnosis in patients with complex health problems and help you regain your health as soon as possible by working in coordination with other branches when needed.

kadin.title: Obstetrics & Gynecology
kadin.p1: Our hospital's Obstetrics and Gynecology clinic aims to protect and improve women's health with a holistic approach at every stage of life. Our expert team, which closely follows all scientific developments and innovative treatment methods in the medical world in their field, provides a world-class service using the most advanced technological possibilities offered by modern medicine. We are by your side with high success rates in the diagnosis and treatment of all gynecological disorders in the period extending from adolescence to menopause.
kadin.p2: In our unit, the pregnancy process is managed with the principle of protecting maternal and infant health at the highest level. Starting from pre-pregnancy counseling services, we exhibit a multidisciplinary approach in prenatal follow-up, management of high-risk pregnancies, and the solution of all kinds of problems that may be encountered regarding birth. With our modern delivery rooms and advanced imaging systems, we aim to complete this miraculous process in the safest and most comfortable way for both the expectant mother and the baby. In our clinic, which is proficient in all details of women's health, providing a personalized, ethics-bound, and empathy-oriented health service for each of our patients is our most basic priority.

anestezi.title: Anesthesiology & Reanimation
anestezi.text: Our Anesthesiology and Reanimation unit provides services to ensure the highest level of patient safety before, during, and after surgical interventions. Our experienced anesthesiologists evaluate each patient's individual characteristics and medical history to determine the most appropriate anesthesia method. General anesthesia, regional anesthesia (spinal, epidural), and local anesthesia options are carefully planned according to the patient's condition and the type of surgery to be performed. During surgery, the patient's heart rhythm, blood pressure, oxygen level, and other vital functions are monitored in real-time. Within the scope of our reanimation services, cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), advanced life support, and stabilization of patients requiring intensive care are provided in emergency situations. With our modern monitoring devices and advanced technology equipment, we safely manage the post-operative recovery process. Our unit aims to ensure patients complete their surgical processes in the safest way by providing 24/7 emergency anesthesia and reanimation support.

ameliyathane.title: Operating Room
ameliyathane.text: Our Operating Room unit offers the highest quality surgical services to our patients with its sterile environment designed to international standards and state-of-the-art surgical equipment. Successful operations are performed in many branches such as general surgery, obstetrics and gynecology, orthopedics, eye surgery, and oral-dental surgery in our fully equipped operating rooms. Our operating rooms have a structure that minimizes the risk of infection with HEPA filtered ventilation system, laminar flow technology, and positive pressure arrangement. Our experienced surgeon staff, anesthesiologists, and operating room nurses act with the power of teamwork in every operation. Patient safety is prioritized at every stage from the pre-operative preparation process to the post-operative recovery room. With our laparoscopic (closed) surgery facilities, less invasive interventions can be performed, thus shortening our patients' recovery times. Our sterilization protocols are regularly audited and the highest hygiene standards are maintained.

dogumhane.title: Delivery Room
dogumhane.text: Our Delivery Room unit offers a comfortable and safe environment equipped with modern medical facilities to protect mother and baby health at the highest level. Our experienced obstetricians, midwives, and nurses are with expectant mothers at every stage of the birth process. Our delivery rooms have a design that prioritizes the comfort and privacy of the mother. We have fully equipped infrastructure for both normal delivery and cesarean section options. From the onset of labor, the heartbeats of the baby and mother are continuously monitored, and preparations are made for immediate intervention against possible complications. Information is provided about different delivery methods such as water birth and painless delivery with epidural anesthesia, and action is taken in accordance with the mother's preferences. Postpartum mother and baby care, breastfeeding counseling, and newborn screenings are also carried out meticulously in our unit. With our family-oriented approach, we are by your side to experience this special moment in the best way.

rontgen.title: X-Ray
rontgen.text: Our X-Ray unit provides services with the latest technology digital X-ray devices in the field of diagnostic imaging. Thanks to the images obtained using X-rays, bone fractures, joint diseases, lung infections, heart size, and many other pathological conditions can be diagnosed quickly and accurately. Our digital X-ray system makes it possible to obtain high-quality images with a much lower radiation dose compared to conventional systems. Chest X-ray, bone and joint X-rays, sinus radiographs, abdominal radiographs, and dental X-rays (panoramic and periapical) are among our main services. Imaging is performed by our experienced radiology technicians, and the images are evaluated by our specialist radiologists and reported in a short time. Special protective measures are taken for pregnant patients and children, and radiation safety is handled meticulously. Results are stored digitally, making them easily accessible and comparable when needed.

laboratuvar.title: Laboratory
laboratuvar.text: Zeytinburnu Medical Center Laboratory provides uninterrupted service to our patients 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. With our modern and fully automatic analysis devices, we produce reliable results in a wide range of tests, including biochemistry, hematology, microbiology, serology, hormones, and urinalysis. In our laboratory, blood count, liver and kidney function tests, lipid profile, thyroid hormones, vitamin levels, infection markers, diabetes monitoring (HbA1c), coagulation tests, and many more analyses are performed. Sampling procedures are performed by our experienced healthcare personnel in hygienic conditions with minimal discomfort. We guarantee the accuracy of our results by regularly participating in internal and external quality control programs. An accelerated processing time is available for urgent tests. You can easily access your test results through the online system and compare them with your past results. Periodic health screenings and check-up packages for preventive health services are also within the scope of our laboratory services.

fizik.title: Physical Therapy
fizik.text: Our Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation unit offers a comprehensive approach in the treatment of musculoskeletal system diseases, neurological disorders, and orthopedic problems. Our specialist physiotherapists and physical therapy technicians create personalized treatment programs for each patient. In our unit, lumbar and cervical disc herniation, shoulder impingement syndrome, tendinitis, bursitis, joint calcification (arthrosis), rheumatic diseases, scoliosis, post-stroke rehabilitation, sports injuries, and post-operative rehabilitation treatments are successfully applied. Various treatment methods such as electrotherapy (TENS, interferential current, ultrasound), manual therapy, exercise therapy, hot-cold applications, laser therapy, and hydrotherapy are used. With our modern rehabilitation equipment, we aim to reduce our patients' pain, increase their mobility, and enable them to return to daily life activities. Chronic pain management, posture correction, and ergonomics training are also among our services.

saglik_raporlari.title: Health Reports
saglik_raporlari.text: Our Health Reports unit issues health certificates required for various official procedures by our authorized physicians. Report processes are carried out meticulously after the necessary examinations and tests, and all reports are prepared in accordance with legal regulations. Driver's license health reports are issued for those who want to obtain or renew their driver's license, health reports including psychotechnical evaluation for firearm licenses, pre-marriage health reports, and athlete health reports for sports licenses and federation applications. Additionally, swimming pool health reports, health reports for job applications and pre-employment examinations, student health reports for school registrations, and health documents required for overseas travel are also prepared in our unit. For special situations, medication use reports, disability assessments, and other reports requiring specialist opinions are also issued by our relevant branch physicians.

ultrason.title: Ultrasonography
ultrason.text: Our Ultrasonography (USG) unit offers the ability to image the internal structures of the body in a radiation-free and painless manner with high-resolution ultrasound devices. This imaging method, obtained using sound waves, is safely used in the diagnosis of many diseases. Internal organs such as liver, gallbladder, kidneys, spleen, pancreas, and bladder are evaluated with abdominal ultrasonography. Nodules and cysts in the thyroid gland are examined with thyroid ultrasound. Muscles, tendons, and superficial masses are imaged with soft tissue ultrasound. Blood flow velocity and blockages in blood vessels can be detected with Doppler ultrasonography. In pregnancy follow-up, ultrasound is an indispensable tool for monitoring fetal development, anomaly screening, and gender determination. Ultrasound examinations performed by our experienced radiologists are quickly reported and presented to our patients. Thanks to its non-invasive nature, ultrasound can be safely applied in all age groups, including pregnant women and children.

solunum.title: Pulmonary Function Test
solunum.text: Our Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) unit provides services to measure how well your lungs are working and to help diagnose respiratory system diseases. The spirometry test evaluates lung capacity, airflow rate, and possible narrowing of the airways. These tests are of great importance in the diagnosis and follow-up of diseases such as asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), bronchitis, emphysema, and pulmonary fibrosis. During the test, the patient takes a deep breath and exhales rapidly through a mouthpiece connected to a special device. The data obtained are evaluated by comparing factors such as age, gender, and height. Pulmonary function tests are also used in pre-operative evaluations, detection of occupational lung diseases, and monitoring response to treatment. The test is painless and short, and the results are interpreted by our experienced pulmonologists, providing detailed information to our patients.

odyometri.title: Audiometry and Tympanometry
odyometri.text: Our Audiometry and Tympanometry unit provides services with advanced testing equipment for comprehensive evaluation of hearing health. The audiometry test determines a person's hearing thresholds using sounds at different frequencies and intensities. Through this test, the degree of hearing loss, its type (conductive, sensorineural, or mixed), and at which frequencies the loss occurs are determined. Tympanometry is an objective test that measures eardrum mobility and pressure in the middle ear. It provides important information in the diagnosis of conditions such as middle ear infections, fluid accumulation, eardrum perforation, and Eustachian tube dysfunction. These tests are used in determining the need for hearing aids, pre-operative evaluation for ear surgery, hearing screenings in children, and occupational hearing loss follow-up. The tests are painless and can be safely applied in all age groups. The results are evaluated by our specialist ENT physicians and the necessary treatment plan is established.

nurse.title: Home Nursing Services
nurse.desc: Injection, dressing, serum application and all nursing services are offered in your home by our professional nurses.

serum.title: Home Serum Services
serum.desc: You can receive safe and hygienic serum service in the comfort of your home without the need for a hospital environment.

lab.title: Home Laboratory Services
lab.desc: Make an appointment for home blood collection, urine analysis and other laboratory tests.

wound.title: Home Wound Care Services
wound.desc: Expert wound care services for post-operative, chronic wounds and burn treatment.

what_is.title: What is Home Health
what_is.p1: A high-comfort living service is provided for patients who want to continue their treatment at home, mothers who request pre- and post-natal support, and elderly people in need of care.
what_is.p2: As Zeytinburnu Medical Center, a wide range of home care services from doctor examinations to long-term nursing services are provided.

covers.title: What Does Home Health Service Cover?
covers.text: The subject of what home health service covers is among the most curious topics. You can benefit from the following services under a wide service range:

doctor_service.title: Home Doctor Service
doctor_service.p1: As Zeytinburnu Medical Center, we offer Home Doctor Service covering services such as routine health examination and disease follow-up.
doctor_service.p2: Ideal especially for bedridden or mobility-impaired individuals.
